title: My first blog award
author: VD
content_html:
Fraters Libertas salutes 2004’s Blogs of Distinction:


The Barbara Eden “Genie, get back in the bottle” Award

Winner: Vox Day for spending the better part of the year championing the repeal of women’s suffrage.

Thank you, Fraters Libertas. Thank you very much. I like to think that I’ve set the bar rather high, although I have no doubt that even now, some unknown blogger is putting together an iron-clad case on how Philip the Fair’s suppression of the Templars caused real wages in France to peak in 1323, inevitably leading to the iniquities of Maximilien Robespierre, Jean-Jacque Rousseau and Michel Foucault.
content_text:
Fraters Libertas salutes
2004’s Blogs of Distinction
:
The Barbara Eden “Genie, get back in the bottle” Award
Winner: Vox Day for spending the better part of the year championing the repeal of women’s suffrage.
Thank you, Fraters Libertas.  Thank you very much.  I like to think that I’ve set the bar rather high, although I have no doubt that even now, some unknown blogger is putting together an iron-clad case on how Philip the Fair’s suppression of the Templars caused real wages in France to peak in 1323, inevitably leading to the iniquities of Maximilien Robespierre, Jean-Jacque Rousseau and Michel Foucault.
